items.summary: Remove the existing 'Message' field from ContactSection and replace it with the new comprehensive form fields, ensuring no unused or redundant fields remain
Maintain the existing coral and charcoal visual design system, modern typography, responsive grid layout, and smooth transitions in the updated ContactSection form
Create a React Query hook in useQueries.ts for submitting client inquiries, following the existing pattern of other query hooks in the file

Update the ContactSection component to include the following form fields: Full Name (text input), Email Address (email input), Phone Number (tel input), Company / Business Name (text input), Website Type (dropdown with options: Personal, Business, E-Commerce, Portfolio), Features / Requirements (textarea), Budget (text input), Deadline (date picker input), and Additional Notes (textarea)

Create a backend endpoint in main.mo to handle client inquiry form submissions, accepting Full Name, Email Address, Phone Number, Company Name, Website Type, Features/Requirements, Budget, Deadline, and Additional Notes as parameters, and storing the inquiry data
Connect the ContactSection form submission to the backend inquiry endpoint using React Query mutation, handling loading states, success feedback, and error handling
